tools.name: execute_select_sql
tools.description: Run SELECT SQL queries to retrieve data from Hologres databases using the Hologres MCP Server, enabling AI Agents to access and analyze database information.
tools.instructions: Execute SELECT SQL to query data from Hologres database.

tools.name: execute_dml_sql
tools.description: Execute INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE SQL queries to modify data directly in Hologres databases via the Hologres MCP Server.
tools.instructions: Execute (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE) SQL to insert, update, and delete data in Hologres databse.

tools.name: execute_ddl_sql
tools.description: Execute CREATE, ALTER, or DROP SQL statements to manage tables, views, procedures, and GUCs in Hologres databases via the Hologres MCP Server.
tools.instructions: Execute (CREATE, ALTER, DROP) SQL statements to CREATE, ALTER, or DROP tables, views, procedures, GUCs etc. in Hologres databse.

tools.name: gather_table_statistics
tools.description: Execute the ANALYZE TABLE command to collect table statistics in Hologres, optimizing query performance and enabling better query plans.
tools.instructions: Execute the ANALYZE TABLE command to have Hologres collect table statistics, enabling QO to generate better query plans

tools.name: get_query_plan
tools.description: Analyze and retrieve the execution plan for a SQL query using this tool, enabling optimized database interactions within the Hologres MCP Server environment.
tools.instructions: Get query plan for a SQL query

tools.name: get_execution_plan
tools.description: Analyze SQL query performance by retrieving the actual execution plan with runtime statistics using this tool. Helps optimize database operations on Hologres MCP Server.
tools.instructions: Get actual execution plan with runtime statistics for a SQL query
